name: 2019 11th International Conference on Bioinformatics and Biomedical Technology (ICBBT 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: ICBBT 2019 Shining Points: 1\. Accepted papers can be published in International Conference Proceedings or International Journal of Pharma Medicine and Biological Sciences (IJPMBS, ISSN: 2278-5221) 2\. Prof. Jose Manuel Fonseca, Universida de Nova de Lisboa, Portugal; Prof. Ralf Hofestedt, Bielefeld University, Germany; Prof. Andre Ribeiro, Tampere University of Technology, Finland will attend the conference as Speakers. 3\. Academic Visit will be arranged on May 31, 2019\. == Paper Publishing: All accepted papers will be published in International Conference Proceedings and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. Or they can be published in International Journal of Pharma Medicine and Biological Sciences (IJPMBS, ISSN: 2278-5221) and indexed by Embase (Under elsevier).
